Text:
Dear Papiertiger!
I cleaned out the obnoxious ads and that stupid first page from the original, it took me ages!
If one hasn't gone through the process one cannot truely appreciate your good deeds.

Now that they blocked access to spiegel.de from the country where my mom lives, this PDf is the only lifeline she has.

So vielen danke shon for all your hard work!
